visual.name: HierarchicalTreeByxViz
visual.description: Hierarchical Tree is an advanced custom visual of the xViz suite built for Power BI to showcase hierarchies in a more visually appealing manner

dataRoles.name: measure
dataRoles.description: Assign what you would like to compare (e.g. most recent Forecast), followed by your benchmark (e.g. Budget)

dataRoles.name: tmeasure
dataRoles.description: Assign data to be shown in tooltip

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

compareSeries.description: Enable this option to compare two data values and to display variance values. Disable to view the value of the second value series.

enableRuntimeConfiguration.description: Enable it to configure sorting, expand to level options during runtime

enableSearch.description: Helps to find and seek specific leaf nodes in the hierarchy

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

level.description: The default level to which the tree will expand by default

miniMap.description: Displays minimap to pan around the canvas of the visual

periodAggregation.description: Configure how to aggregate across time periods

headerBackgroungColor.description: To set the background color for the headers

headerFontColor.description: To set the font color for the headers

headerFontSize.description: To set the Font size for the headers

target.description: To set the title for the Target Value

variance.description: To set the title for Variance

variancePercentage.description: To set the title for the Variance Percentage

categoryFontColor.description: Change the color of the category labels within the nodes

categoryFontSize.description: Change the size of the Category labels displayed within the nodes

highlighedNodeColor.description: Change the color to highlight the selected node

progressBarColor.description: Change the color of the progress bar when conditional formatting is disabled

valueFontColor.description: Change the color of the values displayed within the nodes

valueFontSize.description: Change the size of the values displayed within the nodes

childCountFontColor.description: Change the font color of child count

childCountFontSize.description: Change the font size of the child count for collapsed nodes

contributionFontColor.description: Change the font color of the % Contribution text

contributionFontSize.description: Change the font size of the % Contribution text

displayContribution.description: Show/Hide each member's % Contribution of each node to the hierarchy

displayPVariance.description: Show/Hide Percentage variance text of each node in the hierarchy

displayTableVariance.description: Show/Hide absolute variance value of each node in the hierarchy

displayTargetValue.description: Show/Hide each member's Target Value of each node to the hierarchy

menuIconColor.description: Change the color of the runtime configuration icon

pVarianceFontColor.description: Change the color of the Percentage Variance text

pVarianceFontSize.description: Change the font size of the Percentage Variance text

tableVarinceFontColor.description: Change the font color of the absolute variance text

tableVarinceFontSize.description: Change the font size of the absolute variance text

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

formatNegativeValues.description: Select the number format for  Negative values.

formatPositiveValues.description: Select the number format for  Positive values.

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types

color2.description: When % Variance is above Threshold 2 (if defined)

color3.description: When % Variance is above Threshold 1 but below Threshold 2 (if defined)
